transport.question: I have wheels and can take you places. You pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 I have two wheels.
🛣️ You might wear a helmet when using me.
💪 You use your legs to move me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks, carrying many people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🚂 I am very long.
💺 You can sit inside me.
🚦 I stop at stations.

transport.question: I take people across water, but I'm not a submarine. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float.
⚓ I sometimes have a horn.
👨‍✈️ A captain drives me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take you to faraway lands.

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings.
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.
🌎 I can travel to different countries.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that helps people when they are sick or hurt.

hints.text: 🚨 I have a siren.
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚑 I have a red cross on me.

transport.question: I carry lots of people in a city and stop often.

hints.text: 🛑 I have a route with many stops.
🚌 You pay a fare to ride me.
🏙️ I'm often red, yellow, or blue.

transport.question: I have a motor and two wheels, and people wear helmets when they ride me.

hints.text: 💨 I am faster than a bicycle but smaller than a car.
🧤 You need to use your hands to steer me.
🏍️ I can be loud!

transport.question: I can fly without wings, and I spin my blades around.

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🛬 I can land on the roof of a building.
🚨 Sometimes I am used for rescues

transport.question: I am very big and carry goods all over the country on the road. Sometimes I have 18 wheels!

hints.text: 📦 I often deliver things to stores.
🛣️ You can see me on the highway.
🚚 I'm longer than a car.

transport.question: I travel far out into space and carry astronauts. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast.
👩‍🚀 You need special training to ride in me.
🪐 I travel to other planets.

food.question: I am yellow, long, and curved. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A popular snack for primates
💛 I grow on trees
🚚 I come in bunches

food.question: I am round, juicy, and often red. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I grow on trees.
🥧 I am used in pies and juice.
🩺 Doctors suggest eating one of me often.

food.question: I am white, cold, and sweet. I am often eaten on a hot day and come in many flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 Kids love to eat me in the summer.
🥄 I am often served in a cone or a cup.
🥶 I melt if you leave me out in the sun.

food.question: I am long, orange, and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bugs Bunny's favorite treat!
🥕 I grow in the ground.
👁️ Eating me is good for your eyesight.

food.question: I am made from milk, and I can be hard or soft. Mice love to nibble on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 I'm often eaten with crackers.
🥛 I come in many different flavors and textures.
🍕 You can often find me on top of pizzas.

food.question: I am small, green, and grow in pods. Many people don't like to eat me, but I'm healthy. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a type of legume.
🍲 I'm often served as a side dish.
🧪 Some people think I taste funny.

food.question: I am made of dough and have many toppings. You can slice me into triangles and share me with friends. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 A popular party food.
🍅 Usually has tomato sauce.
🧀 Often topped with cheese.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from cows. I am white and good for your bones. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal.
🥛 I am often served with cereal.
🦴 I am rich in calcium.

food.question: I am a small, round fruit that can be green, red, or purple. I grow in bunches on vines. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I'm used to make juice and jelly.
🍷 I'm also used to make wine (but kids shouldn't drink that!).
🍃 I grow on vines.

food.question: I am a yellow spread made from ground seeds. I am often used in sandwiches and go well with jelly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 Some people are allergic to me.
🥪 I am a popular ingredient in school lunches.
🍞 I'm made from a nut.
